title: Small Fry
description: Francine Brighton is a young woman trying to find out just who she is, and what her place in the world is as she starts her freshman year of college.She finds a kindred soul in a woman, Natasha, who has an affliction that effects how she interacts with people. Natasha harbors another secret that Fran is intimately familiar with.When a person has dropped so low that the only currency they have left is their pride... even the littlest thing can cause an insurmountable rift.Luckily for Fran, her new sister, June, scoffs at the mere concept of the word insurmountable.(London Harmony is a spinoff of the Music of the Soul books.)
author: Erik Schubach
